reviewText: This book is a great introduction to the field of Data Mining.  I read it cover to cover, and found it hard to put down.  The Weka platform is easy to use and well explained in this book.  I have since journeyed into other Data Mining and Machine Learning tools, but I fall back on this book for reference.  Every data scientist should have this book on their shelf.
title: Data Mining: Practical Machine Learning Tools and Techniques, Second Edition (Morgan Kaufmann Series in Data Management Systems)
